mention.text: only years later -- with the commitment to democratization by de facto military governments that led the country from 1982 and 1985 --
the united states that brought about quite harmonious relations between the governments of president cerezo and presidents reagan and bush until mid-1989
the united states , in certain cases
the u.s. attitude toward a country that is making efforts to move forward
